title: Refrigerator

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Whenever two or more non-Everfrost players visit the same player, the next night, one of those visiting players at random will be roleblocked. This effect triggers only once each night.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Refrigerate a player each night. Two or more other non-Everfrost players visiting them tonight doesn't prevent them from being dealt a Basic attack by Eyisa.
